Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run home run in the second inning
Kerry Carpenter added an RBI single in the third
Mickey Moniak made it 3-2 with a 409-foot homer to right-center in the sixth
Pre-Game Insights: The teams were forced to wait out a lengthy rain delay at the outset for the second straight night
Torkelson said, 'We’re a versatile team. One night it might be the pitching staff, another night we get a couple bloopers to fall and some times it is a blast.'
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said, 'We are obviously in a much better place than we’ve been for quite a while, and we’ve earned it', 'But that doesn’t help us win tomorrow. I have to keep everyone grounded and try to get them to play another game like we did today'
Angels manager Ron Washington said, 'We played a better game tonight, but we just didn’t put any runs on the board'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tigers moved two games over.500 at 68-66 for the first time since May 7
Angels lost their seventh straight game and have dropped 13 of 15
There was a 1 hour 50 minute rain delay at the outset
